original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia has a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, similar to most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia. || It is differentiated from other taxa, such as Pteridinium and Rangea, by having smaller petaloids and a configuration of ribs that are sub-parallel to its axis.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.

original: The last president to run after leaving office was Theodore Roosevelt, who came in second in the 1912 election as the presidential nominee of the Progressive Party, although Herbert Hoover did briefly seek the Republican presidential nomination at several national conventions subsequent to leaving office in 1933.
simplified: Theodore Roosevelt was the last president to run after leaving office. || In 1912, he ran as the presidential nominee of the Progressive Party and came in second. || Herbert Hoover briefly sought the Republican presidential nomination at several national conventions after he left office in 1933.
